member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.GetAll
member.summary: This method will return all activities. If there are no activities an empty page will be returned.

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.GetActivitiesOfProject(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return all activities of project with given id If the project doesn't have activities the method will return BadRequest with message "project has no activities"

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.GetActivity(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return the activity with given id. If there are no activity with this id the method will return BadRequest with message "no activity with given id"

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.GetFromTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return all activities that has id between [offset; offset+length) If there are no activities maching, the method will return BadRequest with message "no activities with id between [offset; offset+length)"

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.Add(ActivityTrack.DTO.activity)
member.summary: This method will add a new given activity in database If given activity is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.StartActivity(ActivityTrack.DTO.activity)
member.summary: This method will update the given activity as parametter, setting state to Started If given activity is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.PauseActivity(ActivityTrack.DTO.activity)
member.summary: This method will update the given activity as parametter, setting state to Paused If given activity is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.EndActivity(ActivityTrack.DTO.activity)
member.summary: This method will update the given activity as parametter, setting state to Ended If given activity is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ActivitiesAPIController.Update(ActivityTrack.DTO.activity)
member.summary: This method will update the given activity as parametter. If given activity is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ProjectsAPIController.GetAll
member.summary: This method will return all projects. If there are no projects an empty page will be returned.

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ProjectsAPIController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return the project with given id. If there are no project with this id the method will return BadRequest with message "no project with given id"

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ProjectsAPIController.Add(ActivityTrack.DTO.project)
member.summary: This method will add a new given project in database If given project is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)

member.name: M:ActivityTrack.Controllers.ProjectsAPIController.Update(ActivityTrack.DTO.project)
member.summary: This method will update the given project as parametter. If given project is not valid the method will return BadRequest(ModelState)
